languages.text: "Мерзкий скоморошек. Если опять начнешь плести свои паутины тухлых словес, я вырву твой бесполезный язык!"
"The accursed jester, back again. If you start weaving your webs of rotten claptrap again, I'll rip out your useless tongue!"
languages.original_text: "Мерзкий скоморошек. Если опять начнешь плести свои паутины тухлых словес, я вырву твой бесполезный язык!"

traits.locale_text: "The accursed jester, back again. If you start weaving your webs of rotten claptrap again, I'll rip out your useless tongue!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The accursed jester, back again. If you start weaving your webs of rotten claptrap again, I'll rip out your useless tongue!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The accursed jester, back again. If you start weaving your webs of rotten claptrap again, I'll rip out your useless tongue!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The accursed jester, back again. If you start weaving your webs of rotten claptrap again, I'll rip out your useless tongue!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “这该死的小丑又回来了。如果你再敢编织你那哗众取宠的破网，我就把你那条没用的舌头扯下来！”
languages.original_text: "The accursed jester, back again. If you start weaving your webs of rotten claptrap again, I'll rip out your useless tongue!"

traits.locale_text: “这该死的小丑又回来了。如果你再敢编织你那哗众取宠的破网，我就把你那条没用的舌头扯下来！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «El bufón condenado ha vuelto. ¡Como vuelvas a tejer tus redes de chorradas putrefactas, te arrancaré esa lengua inútil!».
languages.original_text: "The accursed jester, back again. If you start weaving your webs of rotten claptrap again, I'll rip out your useless tongue!"

traits.locale_text: «El bufón condenado ha vuelto. ¡Como vuelvas a tejer tus redes de chorradas putrefactas, te arrancaré esa lengua inútil!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「道化師が戻ってきたか。また腐った戯言をだらだらと言い始めたら、その舌を引きちぎってやる！」
languages.original_text: "The accursed jester, back again. If you start weaving your webs of rotten claptrap again, I'll rip out your useless tongue!"

traits.locale_text: 「道化師が戻ってきたか。また腐った戯言をだらだらと言い始めたら、その舌を引きちぎってやる！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Der verfluchte Narr ist zurück. Wenn Ihr wieder Eure Netze aus vermaledeiter Gülle spinnt, reiße ich Euch Eure nutzlose Zunge heraus!"
languages.original_text: "The accursed jester, back again. If you start weaving your webs of rotten claptrap again, I'll rip out your useless tongue!"

traits.locale_text: "Der verfluchte Narr ist zurück. Wenn Ihr wieder Eure Netze aus vermaledeiter Gülle spinnt, reiße ich Euch Eure nutzlose Zunge heraus!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Revoilà ce maudit bouffon. Si vous recommencez à déblatérer vos âneries sans queue ni tête, je vous arrache la langue ! »
languages.original_text: "The accursed jester, back again. If you start weaving your webs of rotten claptrap again, I'll rip out your useless tongue!"

traits.locale_text: « Revoilà ce maudit bouffon. Si vous recommencez à déblatérer vos âneries sans queue ni tête, je vous arrache la langue ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Yine mi geldin lanet soytarı! Hele yine maval okumaya başla, bakalım o işe yaramaz dilini koparıyor muyum koparmıyor muyum!"
languages.original_text: "The accursed jester, back again. If you start weaving your webs of rotten claptrap again, I'll rip out your useless tongue!"

traits.locale_text: "Yine mi geldin lanet soytarı! Hele yine maval okumaya başla, bakalım o işe yaramaz dilini söküyor muyum sökmüyor muyum!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
